text:
ExecVision | Senior Software Engineer | DC Area or REMOTE | www.execvision.io

ExecVision is a platform that gives customers the ability to analyze what's going on in the conversations their salespeople and customer service reps are having with prospects and clients.

We're built on Postgres / ElasticSearch / Kotlin / Python / React. Seeking strong engineers with some exposure to our stack (willing to cross train), an interest in audio & conversations, machine learning, NLP, and visualizations.

careers@execvision.io
